abstract: In less than a year, the German company has also announced plans to spend $1.3 billion buying Peet’s Coffee & Tea and the Caribou Coffee Company.
snippet: In less than a year, the German company has also announced plans to spend $1.3 billion buying Peet’s Coffee & Tea and the Caribou Coffee Company.
lead_paragraph: Joh. A. Benckiser has quite the caffeine craving, it seems.

headline.main: With Deal, Benckiser Seeks to Bolster Its Coffee Empire

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
